layer.name: Order
layer.definition: Reality has patterns that can be discovered and used.

questions.text: I believe emotions carry meaningful information — they are signals, not random noise.
I believe emotional patterns can be understood, studied, and interpreted.
I see evidence that emotions consistently point to something — unmet needs, violated values, important truths.
I reject the idea that emotions are meaningless chemical fluctuations with no connection to reality.
I believe there is an ordered path to emotional health that can be discovered and followed.
